scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development nodemon -w ../../packages -w graphql -w lib -w express -w .env -w package.json ../yarn.lock -w server.js -w index.js index.js
scripts.db:reset:noseeds: node script/db-migrate-all.js reset && node script/db-migrate-all.js up
scripts.db:reset: yarn run db:reset:noseeds && yarn run db:seed
scripts.test:prepare: rm -rf node_modules/.bin && ln -s ../../../node_modules/.bin node_modules/ && dropdb --if-exists publikator-test && createdb publikator-test && NODE_ENV=development OVERWRITE_ENV=.test.env yarn run db:reset:noseeds && NODE_ENV=development OVERWRITE_ENV=.test.env node ../../packages/search/script/pullElasticsearch.js --no-inserts
scripts.test:travis: yarn run test:prepare && istanbul cover tape "?(__tests__|lib|graphql)/**/*.test.js" --report lcovonly
scripts.test: yarn run test:prepare && NODE_ENV=development OVERWRITE_ENV=.test.env istanbul cover tape "?(__tests__|lib|graphql)/**/*.test.js"
